items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: A simple note-taking app built with React.js to help users quickly add, and delete notes. Inspired by Google Keep, this app offers a clean and intuitive UI for better productivity. ✨ Features: ✅ Add & Delete Notes 📝 ✅ Responsive UI 🎨 ✅ Lightweight & Fast ⚡ ✅ Built with React.js ⚛️
items.title: mansirawal10/keeper-app: A simple note-taking app built with React.js to help users quickly add, and delete notes. Inspired by Google Keep, this app offers a clean and intuitive UI for better productivity.  ✨ Features: ✅ Add & Delete Notes 📝 ✅ Responsive UI 🎨 ✅ Lightweight & Fast ⚡ ✅ Built with React.js ⚛️

items.content_html: Boggle Battle is a real-time multiplayer implementation of the classic word game, built for head-to-head competition between two players. This lightweight project combines React for responsive frontend interactions with a Flask backend and SQLite database to manage game state and word validation.
items.title: stephane957/Boggle-Battle: Boggle Battle is a real-time multiplayer implementation of the classic word game, built for head-to-head competition between two players. This lightweight project combines React for responsive frontend interactions with a Flask backend and SQLite database to manage game state and word validation.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for a CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware...

items.content_html: A simple and lightweight Chrome Extension that uses the webcam to detect motion in real-time. It leverages pixel difference analysis to track movement and display a visual notification when motion is detected.
items.title: meliodas-sama1248/Motion-Detector-Chrome-Extension: A simple and lightweight Chrome Extension that uses the webcam to detect motion in real-time. It leverages pixel difference analysis to track movement and display a visual notification when motion is detected.
